1001620.name: Deep Space Waifu: Nekomimi - Soundtrack
1001620.description:
DEEP SPACE WAIFU - NEKOMIMI SOUNDTRACK



Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 01 Gone
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 02 Nekomimi
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 03 Break The Ice
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 04 Gardenias on Venus
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 05 Gone MENU
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 06 Nekomimi STAGE1
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 07 Break The Ice STAGE2 (BATTLE REMIX)
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 08 Break The Ice STAGE3
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 09 Gardenias on Venus STAGE4 (BATTLE REMIX)
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 10 Nekomimi (BOSS)
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu Nekomimi - 11 Fugue (Dialog)

Every track is .mp3 and it is located in the game's install folder.
